name: World's Worst Handyman
storyline:
Introducing "World’s Worst Handyman", the hilarious comedy-stealth game where you live out your ultimate handyman fantasies while making a difference! As the town's newest handyman, you're on a mission to save the beloved local animal shelter from the brink of bankruptcy.

Embark on a whirlwind adventure, taking on various jobs and striving to fix things without causing total chaos (emphasis on "striving"). But, accidents happen! If you happen to break something, just play it cool, whistle a tune, and maybe no one will notice. Your noble mission depends on your ability to earn money while keeping a low profile.

As you progress, you'll face a series of eccentric adversaries such as gamer grandmas, spooky scarecrows, and even dinosaurs, all trying to hinder your progress. Dodge, sneak, and outrun them as if your life and the fate of the animal shelter depend on it (Spoiler alert: they do!).

In "World’s Worst Handyman” you're not just any handyman; you're a hero on a mission to save the day for countless adorable animals. So grab your toolbelt, and get ready for a heartwarming and hilarious adventure like no other!
summary: Embark on a hilarious, heartwarming, and chaotic adventure as the World's Worst Handyman! Tackle tasks, dodge foes like haunted scarecrows and dinosaurs, and save an animal shelter from bankruptcy in this comedy-stealth journey.
